description: Images of core samples collected from Utah FORGE well 16A(78)-32. These images were created by stitching together multiple photographs resulting in a circumferential view of the cores exterior in two dimensions. Core footages (measured depths) are indicated in the file names, and are annotated on each image. The images, of which there are 30 in the .zip file, are in a .jpg format.

distribution.description: Includes 30 images in jpeg format. Images are of core samples collected from Utah FORGE well 16A(78)-32. These images were created by stitching together multiple photographs resulting in a circumferential view of the core’s exterior in two dimensions. Core footages (measured depths) are indicated in the file names, and are annotated on each image.
distribution.title: Well 16A78-32 Core Photos.zip

publisher.name: Energy and Geoscience Institute at the University of Utah

title: Utah FORGE Well 16A(78)-32 Core Photos
